_comment_description: Students complete sentences using words from the reading passage within specified word limits.
_comment_use_case: Reading Passage 1/2/3, sentence completion with passage words
prompt:
Complete the sentence below. Choose NO MORE than THREE WORDS from the passage.

The new technology will help reduce _____ in urban areas.

_field_descriptions.prompt: Incomplete sentence with word limit from passage
_field_descriptions.answer_key: Exact words/phrases from passage to complete sentence

_validation_rules.answer_key: String of exact words that appear in the passage
_validation_rules.passage_verification: Answer must exist in the reading passage

_grading.grammar_sensitive: Answer must fit grammatically in sentence
